name: Time Axis
description:
Submission for A Jam About Time!

Move right for time to move forwards
Move Left To make it go Backwards!
Trees grow and wont let you pass, unless they're small
Ice melt to let you through, Vines grow and block your path
Get to the treasure to get to the next level! 

Press R to restart if you get stuck!
